concept.description: Provides empty node and edge metrics for Java types aggregating the types including their inner types.
concept.cypher: MATCH (:Artifact)-[:CONTAINS]->(outerType:Java:Type) WHERE NOT outerType:Inner WITH outerType as outerType MATCH (outerType)-[:DECLARES0*0..]->(type:Type) WHERE NOT type:Generated MERGE (outerType)-[:HAS_METRICS]->(nodeMetrics:CodeCharta:Node:Metrics) MERGE (nodeMetrics)-[:AGGREGATES]->(type) MERGE (outerType)-[:HAS_METRICS]->(edgeMetrics:CodeCharta:Edge:Metrics) MERGE (edgeMetrics)-[:AGGREGATES]->(type) RETURN count(type) AS Elements

concept.description: Provides LoC and CC node metrics for Java types.
concept.cypher: MATCH (nodeMetrics:CodeCharta:Node:Metrics)-[:AGGREGATES]->(type:Type) OPTIONAL MATCH (type)-[:DECLARES]->(method:Method) WITH type, nodeMetrics, sum(method.effectiveLineCount) AS loc, sum(method.cyclomaticComplexity) AS cc SET nodeMetrics += { loc: loc, cc: cc } RETURN count(nodeMetrics) AS Elements

concept.description: Provides FanIn node and edge metrics for Java types.
concept.cypher: MATCH (nodeMetrics:CodeCharta:Node:Metrics)-[:AGGREGATES]->(type:Type) OPTIONAL MATCH (:Artifact)-[:CONTAINS]->(dependent:Type)-[:DEPENDS_ON]->(type) WITH type, nodeMetrics, count(dependent) AS fanIn SET nodeMetrics += { fanIn: fanIn } RETURN count(nodeMetrics) AS Elements

concept.description: Provides FanOut node and edge metrics for Java types.
concept.cypher: MATCH (nodeMetrics:CodeCharta:Node:Metrics)-[:AGGREGATES]->(type:Type) OPTIONAL MATCH (type)-[:DEPENDS_ON]->(dependency:Type)<-[:CONTAINS]-(:Artifact) WITH type, nodeMetrics, count(dependency) AS fanOut SET nodeMetrics += { fanOut: fanOut } RETURN count(nodeMetrics) AS Elements

concept.description: Creates a CodeCharta report for Java types.
concept.cypher: MATCH (element:Java)-[:HAS_METRICS]->(:CodeCharta:Metrics), tree = shortestPath((root:Java:Package)-[:CONTAINS*]->(element)) WHERE NOT ( element:Generated or (:Package)-[:CONTAINS]->(root) // identify the root package ) WITH nodes(tree) as elements UNWIND elements as element // filter out duplicate packages WITH distinct element OPTIONAL MATCH (parent:Package)-[:CONTAINS]->(element) OPTIONAL MATCH (element)-[:HAS_METRICS]->(metrics:CodeCharta:Node:Metrics) RETURN element AS Element, element.name AS ElementLabel, parent AS Parent, metrics AS Metrics
